info.name: Youtube Custom Color for da boiz
info.description:
simple recolor with gradients 'n stuff.
also yeah, code's bad.

settings.label: you know that dot on the video bar? that's the recolor. (i recommend it be a lil' darker than main)
How much you want of that color on the video bar? (number from 0 to 100)
How much you want of that color on the volume bar? (number from 0 to 100)
